atomic_number.description: The charge number of the element's atomic nucleus. Equal to the number of protons in ordinary nuclei.

molar_mass.description: Method of measurement where 1 mole is equal to the number of atoms in 12 grams of carbon-12.

position.description: Coordinates to identify position of element.

period.description: A row of elements, each having the same number of electron shells.

family.description: A column of elements, each having similar physical or chemical characteristics of their outermost electron shells.

melting_point.description: Temperature at which solid matter liquifies.

boiling_point.description: Temperature at which liquid matter evaporates.
